Name: assign_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary variable indicating if a User Story is assigned to the current Sprint Backlog.

Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary variable indicating if a Worker is assigned to a specific Task.

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary variable indicating if a Feature is included in a Release Plan.

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary variable indicating if a Worker is assigned to a specific Team.

Name: set_team_size
Description: Integer variable determining the number of workers on a Team.

Name: allocate_worker_availability
Description: Float variable representing the percentage of a Worker's time allocated to a sprint.

Name: set_sprint_start_date
Description: Date variable determining the start date of the next sprint.

Name: form_new_team
Description: Binary variable indicating if a new team should be formed.

Name: assign_scrum_master_to_team
Description: Binary variable indicating if a person is assigned as Scrum Master to a Team.

Name: set_task_effort
Description: Float variable to estimate or set the effort in hours for a Task.

Name: choose_blocker_to_resolve
Description: Binary variable to decide if a specific Blocker will be actively worked on in a sprint.

Name: set_story_story_points
Description: Integer variable to set the story points for a user story during backlog refinement.
